definitions.definition: a member of the genus Canis (probably descended from the common wolf) that has been domesticated by man since prehistoric times
a dull unattractive unpleasant girl or woman
a smooth-textured sausage of minced beef or pork usually smoked
a hinged catch that fits into a notch of a ratchet to move a wheel forward or prevent it from moving backward
metal supports for logs in a fireplace
go after with the intent to catch
